name: Roll, the Die
description:
Instructions:

  • WASD to move
  • Left mouse button to attack
  • Right mouse button to dodge and change attack
  • Space bar to skip dialogue and tutorial

This game was made by 5 team members of GameDev Técnico!

  • Eduardo Espadeiro - programmer
  • Ivo Duarte - art
  • Maria Gomes - programmer
  • Paulina Wykowska - art
  • Pedro Godinho - programmer
